title: Tender for Supply of Locally Manufactured Unsterilized Latex Examination Gloves On Long Term Agreement for the Year 2014
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to extend the contract of the present supplier for the supply of the above items, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
